text: 13.57: Mt 11.6 naŋga, Mk 6.3-4 naŋga, Lu 4.24 naŋga, Jo 4.44Kamavata nuŋɨrɨm kɨpuhɨputɨmu. Kamatɨhura Jisas nurɨŋ nɨmavami, Kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara mɨŋga mupɨhu mupɨhu nu ñɨmbi naŋga mɨŋga kɨndi. Hara nuŋandɨ pɨhu tɨmbanzɨkwɨyɨ naŋga nuŋandɨ tavɨyɨ nu ñɨmbi manɨman mɨŋga kɨndi, vami.
